1.text: A Song of degrees of David.  If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;

2.text: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

3.text: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

4.text: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

5.text: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

6.text: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.

7.text: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

8.text: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
